t: Verizon Value Hires Amazon Ring's Mary Sagripanti as CMO
s: April 1, 2025 - Verizon Value has hired Amazon Ring’s top marketer Mary Sagripanti as vp and chief marketing officer (CMO). She fills the position left vacant by Cheryl Gresham, who left the business in February to take on the job of svp, North America marketing at Starbucks.
